heading: Hey there! I'm Gautham Krishna
paragraphs: I craft slick, artisan-grade digital experiences — the kind that make users smile and devs curious. Think smooth animations, snappy performance, and layouts with soul.
When I’m not building playful interfaces, I’m probably dreaming up side projects, debugging déjà vu errors, or trying (and failing) to relax.
footnote: Let’s build something that makes the web a little less boring.
